revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=COVR-C1200 |revision=A1 |series=AC1200 |asin=B079S3NVV4 |price=250 |est_release_date=01/08/2018 |fcc_date=02/05/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |manuf_model=COVR-1203 |manuf_rev=US |type=wireless system, mesh node |fcc_id=KA2COVRC1200A1 |ic_id=4216A-COVRC1200A1 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PK701YF3, 1701, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=16 |ram1=128 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A, PK701YF3, 1701, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE711SG, E071104; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, PK721Q3V, 1721, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module (FEM);Qorvo (RFMD);QPF4518M;Q, QPF4518M, 5EMS;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX, }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/dual-band-whole-home-wi-fi-system-covrc1203/}} (US) - COVR-C1203 (3x Kit) :[https://dlinkmea.com/index.php/product/details/?det=TzBYd0RaZUwyRzh0c254dTJ2R0o2dz09 Product Page] and [https://dlinkmea.com/upload/downloadable/COVR_C1203_5a6da9380d9d9.pdf Datasheet] on ''D-Link Middle East & Africa'' Also known as: * COVR-C1203 when sold as a three-pack ($250) * COVR-C1202 when sold as a "twin-pack" * COVR-C1200 when sold individually :"2×3 internal antennas for optimal range and connectivity" on the US product page likely refers to the fact that the QCA9563 used for 2.4GHz b/g/n is capable of 3x3:3 but only two of three transmit chains and spatial streams are implemented giving us 2x3:2 (300 Mbps). 5GHz an/ac is only 2x2:2. Web GUI: http://covr.local./ ===Announced at CES 2018=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33171-d-link-announces-new-wi-fi-systems-routers-and-cameras-at-ces-2018 ''D-Link Announces New Wi-Fi Systems and Routers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===See also=== :[[List_of_Wireless_Systems#D-Link_Covr]] *[[D-Link COVR-C1200 rev A1|D-Link COVR-C1200]] - ''AC1200 Dual Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' *[[D-Link COVR-C1203]] - ''AC1200 Dual-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x3 2.4/5GHz, MU-MIMO, Smart Roaming, $250 (Q1 2018) [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2017/33052-d-link-ces-2017-announcements PR] *[[D-Link COVR-2202]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x2 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 5GHz (backhaul), Alexa, $320 (Q2 2018) *[[D-Link COVR-P2500 rev A1|D-Link COVR-P2500]] - ''AC1200 Hybrid Powerline Wi-Fi System'' *[[D-Link COVR-3902]]-US - ''AC3900 Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' *[[D-Link DHP-W732AV]] - ''Covr PowerLine Wi-Fi System'' (PLC) *[[D-Link DKT-883]] - ''Covr Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :*[[D-Link DIR-883 rev A1]] - ''Covr AC2600 Wi-Fi Router'' :*[[D-Link DAP-1655 rev A1]] - ''Covr AC1300 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' *[[D-Link DIR-X6060]] - ''AX6000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 6 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port *[[D-Link DIR-X9000]] - ''AX11000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 11 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port :8x high-performance antennas, DLNA, D-Link Wi-Fi App __NOTOC__
